baseDescription:
Bob the bob.
Old fart sitting in the pub, some people say he sells good tools.
withObjectDescription:
Bob the bob.
Old fart sitting in the pub.
He seems to like you for some mysterious reason.
afterStoryOptions: 2. Chat with Bob a bit more
storyText:
--- Bob's story ---
"Back in my day, I used to be an adventurer like you. These tools? I forged 'em myself.
Each one has a story, and each one will serve you well if you respect 'em."
